textAfterTable: Show more Show less ? While there's no exact limit to the number of links you should include on a page, best practice is to avoid exceeding 200 links. Links pass value from one page to another, but the amount of value that can be passed is split between all of the links on a page. This means that adding unnecessary links will dilute the potential value attributed to your other links. Using the Nofollow attribute prevents value from being passed to the linking page, but it's worth noting that these links are still added to the equasion when calculating the value that is passed through each link, so Nofollow links can also dilute pagerank. 2.2421524663677 Broken Links High impact
